name: template
description: Application template (TypeScript, ReactJs, Redux, Redux-Saga, ExpressJs, TypeORM)

scripts.setup: cd ./common && yarn add file:../common && yarn && cd ../client && yarn add file:../common && yarn && cd ../server && yarn add file:../common && yarn
scripts.build: cd ./common && yarn build && cd ../client && yarn build && cd ../server && yarn build
scripts.start: cd ./server && yarn start && cd ../client && yarn start
